text.Jay: Great staff, great owner, great coffee. The atmosphere is cozy and nice, certainly my absolute favorite go-to spot as a local.

text.Gaga: Excellent coffee though the most expensive of the up-market expresso drinks. Indoor seating is generally good if available. Will definitely be making a return trip.

text.Rath: YESSS Best coffee in the east side.

text.Ray: Unpretentious coffee shop with pour over prices 2 dollars cheaper than most local coffee shops around the area.

text.Mine: One of the best coffee shops in (CN). I drive 30 minutes (at least) across town to come to this place.

text.Cavin: Set of bags for entertainment. Parking lot. Great place to relax between brewery and studio/gallery exploration. Today's choice is Double shots in espresso drinks, nitro on tap and roasted coffee by the pound to take home.

text.Chris: Fun place with great coffee with guys

text.Dora: Finally the time has come. I am here!!!

text.Sussanne: HERE is one of the top roasters in the nation so the coffee is expectedly awesome!

text.COREA: YESSSSS!!!! wonderful coffee and amazing Super awesome staff too ❤️

text.Amy: hey soo! i am there just behind you

text.Kate: Great coffee and a wonderful space for meeting up with friends.

text.Gorge: My absolute favorite coffee bar. Their nitro cold brew is amazeballs.

text.YOUNGE: Great coffee, good people, good vibes.

text.Anna: My FAV neighborhood coffee shop! I go here for quick drinks on-the-go and also to buy some of their yummy beans. They even have the option of grinding them for you there.

text.Becky: I love this place. I come here frequently to work and the staff is just so friendly and welcoming. Plenty of seating (and parking), a really cool bar in the center of the space and tasty coffee, of course!

text.Betheny: Great coffee, wonderful atmosphere, fantastic baristas. They’ve got more than your typical selection of coffee drinks, including nitro coffee, and canned cold brew. They also have non-coffee goodies. It’s spacious and quiet inside making it a great place to hang out.

text.LOL: Great coffee shop! Staff is always helpful and friendly and the coffee is great, especially the cold brew. The outdoor seating is perfect when the weather’s nice.
